title: Made you something GD.
body:
Just have been dorking around with small body shapes. This one is known as the Weebi... I mean. Chibi.

Edit: It kinda looks like those stickers on Facebook. The cat ones. 
Edit 2: Done for the night on 5/19. Will prob draw again on 5/20. If you sub to my stream, you wont have to keep checking on thread to see if its alive.

EDIT 3: I have a visitor today who wants to draw as well. Just drop in the stream or post in thread who you want to draw what. If nothing is said then we will draw the same champion. We will start where we left off. Stream in 5 min.

Dropping stream link. http://www.twitch.tv/besteau
